body.name: Pantene Conditioner Twin Pack with Hair Treatment Set, Smooth and Sleek for Frizz Control, Safe for Color-Treated Hair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 53 mins
features: HARD WORKING Fuels hair with a potent blend of Pro-V nutrients and antioxidants so hair is shiny and free of frizz
LONG LASTING Gently conditions with a vitamin-rich formula with 2x more nutrients, with results that last 72 plus hours
SMOOTHNESS WITH EVERY WASH Soften stubborn strands to smooth hair for lasting frizz control
ROOT TO TIP NOURISHMENT These powerful Smooth & Sleek formulas work together to permeate every strand, smoothing hair from the inside out
HAIR MASK SHOT dry hair moisturizing treatment noticeably repairs extreme damage in 1 use
body.description: HARD WORKING, LONG LASTING Your haircare should work as hard as you do. Pantene PRO-V Smooth & Sleek Conditioner visibly transforms frizzy hair into smooth hair with lasting frizz control. This anti frizz conditioner contains 2x more nutrients and won't weigh down your strands so you get smoothness in every wash and 72 plus hours of frizz taming. This formula is safe for colored hair and crafted with protective anti-oxidants and pH balancers to leave you with healthy and shiny strands. With Pantene Pro-V Smooth & Sleek Conditioner, say goodbye to frizzy strands and unleash soft, hydrated hair that looks and feels beautiful for longer. Plus, a Miracle Rescue Intense Rescue Shot is included to help deeply repair current signs of hair damage.2X MORE NUTRIENTS, LASTS FOR 72 PLUS HOURS This Pantene PRO-V Smooth & Sleek Conditioner is designed to be used with other frizzy hair products and hair shine products, like our complete Smooth & Sleek Collection that infuses your hair with optimal softness and shine with 2x more nutrients. These powerful Smooth & Sleek formulas work together to permeate every strand, smoothing hair from the inside out for results that last 72 plus hours without washing. These formulas are crafted with protective antioxidants, Pro-Vitamin B5, and pH balancers, and made without parabens or colorants.TO USEMassage Pro-V Conditioner into your cleansed hair, making sure to pay special attention to your ends. Rinse thoroughly. This color-safe conditioner is gentle enough for everyday use on chemically-treated hair or color-treated hair, and gives you results that last for 72 plus hours without washing. For strands in need of extra moisture and repair follow with the Pantene Miracle Rescue Intense Rescue Shot. To apply, dispense the ampoule into hand and massage into damp hair from mid-lengths to ends. Rinse thoroughly for visibly healthier hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pantene is the best
reviews.reviewText: Love this conditioner, love being able to order 2 at a time and not have to go to the store!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best conditioner money can buy
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Pantene Smooth & Sleek for years, and every time I get away from it (if it's sold out, for example) I always come back and buy it again as soon as I can. I've tried everything (including the one that everyone's obsessed with that stylists like to try to sell you that starts with an "o" and ends with an "x", which coincidentally has the same ingredients as this product, at a massively inflated price) and Pantene Smooth & Sleek is by far the most moisturizing, and leaves my hair in the absolute best condition.While other Pantene products are pretty good, this one stands out for me (my fall back is Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal conditioner, but it isn't nearly as good as the Smooth & Sleek.) I have naturally curly (2b) frizzy, bleached hair that I flatiron several times per week. I have been coloring and highlighting my own hair at home for years, and I have tried so many different products and techniques to try to get the hair that I want, while minimizing damage. This stuff is the absolute best. After I shampoo (which I do daily, believe it or not) I make sure to glob it on my wet hair in generous amounts, finger-comb it through, and then leave it on as long as possible while I shower (anywhere from 5-10 minutes.) I always get amazing results.This particular order came with two massively sized bottles of conditioner, and a small single-use vial of a treatment. The treatment itself has the same appearance, consistency, and scent as the hair conditioner, so I'm not entirely convinced it isn't just a little vial of conditioner honestly. 😂 Apart from that, I find this stuff to be great value given how soft and free from breakage it leaves my colour-treated, straightened hair, and the amount of product you receive for the price. I love the two pack, because I regularly shower in two different bathrooms at home, and I can leave one bottle in each room. Unlike with other products, I've never experienced an issue with the pumps on these bottles. They never arrive broken, and they're always super easy to open up and use right away (unlike some other products where the pump keeps spinning but never pops up to open.) Also unlike competitors' products, these bottles have never caused me injury in the shower (don't ask 😂.)I use all kinds of different shampoos from a variety of brands and types, ranging from toning (purple) shampoos, to clarifying, to moisturizing, depending on the condition of my hair and what I'm trying to achieve that day. However, I almost always follow it up with Pantene Smooth & Sleek, and beautiful healthy hair is the result. Honestly, I would continue to buy this if it were 4x the price (but I'm glad it isn't!) I definitely recommend it to others and I hope this product is available for a long time to come.
